data.actual_result: Some of the text is cut off at the ends of the lines. This even sometimes includes clipping in the middle of a letter, as shown in the attachment. The link is still functional.
data.expected_result: The entire link should display on screen.
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a text channel with multiple long, hyphenated links sent. - I used <#274590523719811074> in this server. - Observe.
